field_value: Omron Electronics Pty Ltd imports and distributes a wide range of industrial and automation components. The company is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Japanâ€™s Omron Corporation, and is headquartered in the Sydney suburb of Silverwater, New South Wales, with additional offices in Melbourne and Brisbane. The companyâ€™s central warehouse in Sydney stocks over 1,000 products and is managed by a rigorous supply chain management system.Sensing and Control ComponentsThis division supplies a wide range of products for consumer and commercial applications. The range includes relays and switches for household appliances and machinery, as well as temperature control devices, sensors and programmable controllers. Advanced Automation SolutionsIn this area, Omron Electronics supplies control components for a variety of manufacturing applications, including inventory and production control, quality control and integration, plant management and control systems. Its products include machine vision systems, temperate controls and other automation systems.
